name: Sports Club Management System
description: A responsive React.js application for managing sports club activities including court bookings, role-based dashboards, payment processing with Stripe, and user authentication.
features: Role-based dashboards for Admin, Riders, and Customers
Live parcel tracking with delivery status updates
Integrated Stripe payment for secure transactions

name: GreenNest
description: A full-featured web application to track and manage indoor plants. Users can view plant details, monitor watering schedules, and sort plants by care level or next watering date.
features: Role-based dashboards for Admin, Riders, and Customers
Live parcel tracking with delivery status updates
Integrated Stripe payment for secure transactions

name: Food Expiry Tracker System
description: A full-stack web app to track food items, monitor expiry dates, get usage suggestions, and minimize waste. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, and MongoDB.
features: Role-based dashboards for Admin, Riders, and Customers
Live parcel tracking with delivery status updates
Integrated Stripe payment for secure transactions

name: SwiftParcel
description: A parcel management and delivery tracking platform where users can schedule, pay, and track their deliveries in real time. Features include role-based dashboards for admins, riders, and users.
features: Role-based dashboards for Admin, Riders, and Customers
Live parcel tracking with delivery status updates
Integrated Stripe payment for secure transactions

name: MyBank
description: A secure online banking system for handling deposits and withdrawals history.
features: Make payments directly using their account balance.
Track paid bills .
Register, login, and manage their profile securely.

name: GadgetGalaxy
description: An e-commerce website for electronics featuring product browsing, category filters, shopping cart, and wishlist. Users can browse products, add/remove items from the cart, and save their favorite products for later.
features: Add to Cart – Easily add products to the shopping cart.
Secure Authentication – Login powered by Auth0.
Save Favorite – Save products for later viewing.

name: FurniSpace
description: A modern furniture e-commerce web application built with Next.js 15.It allows users to browse products, view details, and authenticated users can add new products from a protected dashboard.
features: Browse all available products from the database.
Authentication (NextAuth.js).
Protected Route for managing products.
Add products dynamically.

name: DocTalk
description: An appointment booking system where patients can find doctors by specialty, view availability, and book appointments.
features: Securely book appointments with just a few clicks.
Patients can view their booked appointments.
Works seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

name: CozyHaven
description: CozyHaven is a modern e-commerce frontend website where users can browse products, view details, and filter items by category with a clean UI and smooth interactions.
features: Explore a variety of products with images and details.
Click on any item to see detailed information.
Filter products by categories.
